header.author: Anonymous
header.title: A treatise of the gravel and stone, shewing, I. Their nature, causes, difference, and symptoms. II. The method of curing them. III. How to ease and remove the fits when present. And, IV. To prevent them for the future. With their proper remedies prescrib'd; and easily to be prepared, by the patients themselves. Writen, ... by a late learned and eminent physicain [sic] ...
